title: Halloween 2k4 [2004] - pacman comic - halloween.sdworkshop.com
description:
Halloween 2k4
=============
2nd Edition, May 2007
released for BitTorrent on February 5th 2008

-------------------------------------------------------------
Contains:       2x24 pages + cover art, JPG, 800x1100, 7.21MB
Language:       Both English & German (original language)
-------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
------------
In order to save costs, the ministry of education decides to
use a toxin on certain schools, which makes the students dumb.
When the dose is increased, the program ends in a disaster:
Everyone becomes a zombie. Some students are able to escape
and now try to stop this madness...

Further notes:
--------------
Thank you for downloading our comic Halloween 2k4!
This story was originally written for a small audience,
the students at the school we went to, on the occasion of
Halloween 2004. At the time, we only printed 30 copies
and sold them to our friends and family.
Translating it into the English language and making it
available internationally was always a dream to us
and it has now finally come true.
Many thanks go to our friends for their support
and to the bittorrent network for making this possible.
We hope you enjoy this comic that took us so much trouble...
Stefan & Kristof

Credits:
--------
Story, characters, pencils, coloring: Kristof Tarisznyas &
				      Stefan Grassberger
Logo & first lettering:               Kristof Tarizsnyas
Translation, final lettering:         Stefan Grassberger
2nd Edition cover art & book layout:  Stefan Grassberger
